description: tube skirt in four sections; top band blue; second band red; third black with red and tan vertical stripes; fourth band red and gold horizontal stripes with embroidery at bottom; three bands of embroidery-top triangles in tan; center stripes in pink, lavender, orange and magenta; bottom diamonds in same colors with tan triangles separating colored bands; vertical stripes alongside seam of embroidery section
title: Skirt
